title: Saturday Night Live Premiere Woody Harrelson Joe Biden SNL
text:
All of our leading Democratic candidates for president were nice enough to gather for another town hall on SNL last night, and, as expected, Crest Whitestrips ambassador and front-runner Joe Biden (Woody Harrelson) fielded the toughest questions with that megawatt smile. And by fielding the toughest questions, we obviously mean avoiding any answers as Kamala Harris (Maya Rudolph) sips a literal cocktail by his side. “Now as I ask anytime I walk into a room, where am I and want the hell is going on?” he tells the crowd. “I’m like plastic straws. I’ve been around forever, I’ve always worked, and now you’re mad at me? Drink up, America!” Yeah, drink up.

Two candidates are already reveling in their sketch impersonations. No word yet from Marienne Williamson, who may or may not be astral-projecting.

Haha great to see @bowenyang as me on @nbcsnl! If anyone has the footage please post it below. 😀👍 — Andrew Yang (@AndrewYang) September 29, 2019

YESSSSSSSSSSENATOR!!! An honor to attempt to be as cool as you💜 — Maya Rudolph (@MayaRudolph) September 29, 2019
description: Woody Harrelson debuted a Joe Biden impersonation on Saturday Night Live, and he’s a bit of a creeper with white teeth.
